sentences.english: The slope only affected the SHIBOR swap spread.
sentences.chinese: 斜率因素只對SHIBOR利率互換有着顯著的影響。

sentences.english: And the slopes of characteristic line sections represent planarization of film surface.
sentences.chinese: 特徵線段的斜率反映了薄膜表面的平面度。

sentences.english: What's the slope? Is it positive, negative?
sentences.chinese: 斜率是多少，正的還是負的？

sentences.english: That slope is the marginal propensity to consume.
sentences.chinese: 這個斜率就是邊際消費傾向。

sentences.english: I don't actually have any slope.
sentences.chinese: 事實上沒有任何的斜率。

sentences.english: That tells us the slope with which we approach the origin.
sentences.chinese: 它告訴我們靠近原點處的斜率。

sentences.english: And so what is the slope of that line?
So, here, I have, actually, a pretty big slope.
sentences.chinese: 所以，在這兒時，有一個非常大的斜率。

sentences.english: Finally, the backlash slope and the backlash width can be obtained by curve fitting technic.
sentences.chinese: 最後利用曲線擬合的方法可獲得間隙的寬度和斜率。

sentences.english: If I follow this slope up to here, it'll intercept somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 如果我按這個斜率上升到這，它會被截在某處。

sentences.english: And now, if I keep rotating, then the slope will decrease again.
sentences.chinese: 現在如果我一直轉，那麼斜率又會減小。

sentences.english: So the slope of the guess is the first derivative.
sentences.chinese: 因此斜率等於此處的一階導數。

sentences.english: The primitive mantle-normalized PGE patterns belong to the positive slope type.
sentences.chinese: PGE對原始地幔標準化模式呈正斜率型。

sentences.english: Exactly predicting the build-up rate is the key to success in middle-short radius horizontal well.
sentences.chinese: 準確的造斜率預測是側鑽中短半徑水平井成功的關鍵。

sentences.english: So entropy of mixing here is driving this positive slope.
sentences.chinese: 混合熵的作用是是使這個斜率爲正。

definition: intercept (the point at which a line crosses the x- or y-axis)
derived function/derivative f' of a function f
axis of symmetry/central axis (in Chinese architecture)
